question: Recently I have been getting dizzy right after eating. It is getting to be a pain in the butt. I have had my thyroid checked and my medication for that is correct and I just got my blood pressure checked and they said it was excellent. So I have no idea what it could be. Any Ideas?
title: Dizziness and eating
